description: In this role play update Devi Emerson plays a bitchy inmate at the Sunnydale Detention Facility. She is always getting in fights and causing problems for her counselors, so she is taken to Dr. Rayne for some more extreme treatments. Unfortunately this shoot had to be cut short before we got to the electricity, but I think you will enjoy this bonus none the less!
title: Sunnydale Detention Facility
